quality_assessment: Page is comprehensive but contains detailed documentation of features that may not be fully implemented in the actual command. Some documented phases and line number references appear outdated or aspirational.

issues.description: Documentation describes detailed content sufficiency validation with specific line references (.claude/commands/prodigy-detect-documentation-gaps.md:166-335) but the actual command file doesn't contain this detailed multi-step validation at those line numbers. The actual command is 399 lines total.
issues.fix_suggestion: Verify which validation features are actually implemented in the command and update line references accordingly. Remove or mark as planned any features not yet implemented.

issues.description: Documentation references 'Phase 7.5' structure validation with line references (.claude/commands/prodigy-detect-documentation-gaps.md:678-743) but actual command only has 399 lines. This phase may be documented aspirationally rather than reflecting current implementation.
issues.fix_suggestion: Audit the actual command phases against documented phases. Update or remove references to non-existent phases and line numbers.

issues.description: The test file (tests/documentation_gap_detection_test.rs:403-490) shows stub files including 'Best Practices', 'Use Cases', 'Examples', and 'Troubleshooting' sections, but the actual command documentation explicitly states 'Do NOT include Prerequisites, Installation, Best Practices, or Troubleshooting sections in chapter stubs'.
issues.fix_suggestion: Clarify the intended stub file structure - either update tests to match command guidance or update documentation to reflect actual test behavior.

issues.description: Page is text-heavy without MkDocs Material visual features such as admonitions (info, warning, tip boxes), tabs for alternative examples, or code annotations.
issues.fix_suggestion: Enhance page with MkDocs Material features: use admonitions for important notes and warnings, add tabs for different use cases, add code annotations where appropriate.

issues.description: The page documents book/mdbook gap detection but doesn't mention MkDocs documentation detection capabilities. For MkDocs documentation (like this site), different commands are used (prodigy-detect-mkdocs-gaps).
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a note clarifying this documents book/mdBook gap detection, and link to MkDocs-specific gap detection if that documentation exists.
issues.source_reference: This is docs/ which uses MkDocs, but page documents book/ workflows

positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of gap detection workflow phases
Good code examples showing JSON structure for gap reports and flattened items
Clear explanation of severity classification (high, medium, low)
Well-structured with logical flow from overview to detailed phases
Includes test coverage information with file references
Good execution progress example showing real-world output
Covers both single-file and multi-subsection chapter handling
improvement_suggestions: Add MkDocs Material admonitions for critical information (like 'MANDATORY' and 'CRITICAL' notes)
Consider adding a workflow diagram showing gap detection phases
Add cross-reference to related MkDocs gap detection documentation
Verify all line number references against actual source files
Add a 'Quick Reference' section summarizing key commands and outputs

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
